int purify_image_compare ( purify_image *  img1,
purify_image *  img2,
double  tol 
)

Compare two image objects to see whether they hold identical data.

Parameters:
[in]img1First image object.
[in]img2Second img object.
[in]tolTolerance used when comparing doubles.
Return values:
comparisonZero if objects contain identical data, non-zero otherwise.
Authors:
Jason McEwen

const char *  filename,
purify_image_filetype  filetype 
)

Read image from file.

Parameters:
[out]imgImage read from the file.
[in]filenameName of the file to read.
[in]filetypeType of file to read.
Return values:
errorZero return indicates no errors.
Note:
Memory for the image is allocated herein and must be freed by the calling routine.
